### 1. Compile code:
```
javac circleoflife/src/ShapeGenerator.java
javac circleoflife/src/CircleOfLife.java
```

### 2. Generate random shapes:
```
cd circleoflife/src
MAX_SHAPE_WIDTH=100
MAX_SHAPE_HEIGHT=100
NUM_SHAPES=7
SHAPE_DIMENSIONS=/home/you/shapes.tsv
java ShapeGenerator ${MAX_SHAPE_WIDTH} ${MAX_SHAPE_HEIGHT} ${NUM_SHAPES} > ${SHAPE_DIMENSIONS}
```

### Shape dimensions file columns:
| shape ID | width | height | x1_min | x1_max | ... | xHeight_min | xHeight_max | y1_min | y1_max | ... | yWidth_min | yWidth_max |
|----------|-------|--------|--------|--------|-----|-------------|-------------|--------|--------|-----|------------|------------|

#### Example shape dimensions file:

### Example layout configuration file:
```
shapesDimensionsPath = /home/you/shapes.tsv
outputLayoutPath = /home/you/layout.tsv
outputImagePath = /home/you/layout.png
layoutBaseRadius = 10
interShapeGapSize = 2
```

### 3. Generate layout:
```
cd circleoflife/src
CONFIG_FILE=/home/you/config.txt
java CircleOfLife ${CONFIG_FILE}
```
### Layout file columns:
| shape ID | x | y | number of rotations |
|----------|---|---|---------------------|

#### Example layout file:
```
3	26	48	2
2	94	95	3
5	124	0	0
1	49	123	3
6	0	95	3
4	98	166	0
0	195	72	0
```
